name: project
description: Level X – Mad Professor Demo A fully playable Level‑1 web demo that runs offline in any modern browser (desktop + mobile). Flow: Start → Intro Video → Rules (4 slides) → Quiz (10 A/B questions, 20 s each) → After → Congrats/Retry. Answer key: A, B, A, A, B, B, A, B, B, B. Score ≥ 5 shows Congrats, otherwise Retry. The first correct answer displays a “Correct #1” card for ~1.5 s, then resumes.
